Text:
Just One Question Sir... Do I Need An Original Mod-Manager Before I Can Use This? 

Thanks....
No, this includes all the files you need.
Hi, i cant find C:/Users//AppData/Local/Black_Tree_Gaming/NexusClient.exe_Url_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx/0.18.9.0/. Where is this located at?
Hi first it never asked for a username and second. it cant find the game files for my torrented games. skyrim with razor fallout3.iso or oblivion. will i have to mod manually
This shit is 64-bit only. And it says it doesn't work with "NMM Install Info v.5.0" or something. I don't know what does it mean but it's useless for me.

There is nothing wrong with this. Works on WinXP SP3 x86.

XP path:
C:Documents and SettingsYOUR USERNAME HERELocal SettingsApplication DataBlack_Tree_Gaming   ...

OR
Start > Run:
Local SettingsApplication DataBlack_Tree_Gaming   ...
